main event: A youth and his friend reported seeing one or more unidentified objects exhibiting erratic motions over a period of almost two hours in Middleboro, Massachusetts on February 10, 1964.
interesting points: The objects changed direction frequently, flying up and down as well as in a zig-zag pattern.
The objects were able to stop suddenly and change course, suggesting they had some form of unusual propulsion.
The witness believed the objects were not conventional aircraft like jets based on their speed and maneuverability.
The witness reported hearing an unusual sound like a heavy object being dropped when the objects were about to leave the area.
The witness was an avid believer in flying saucers and liked to go out searching for them.
sighted object: one or more unidentified flying objects
